# Zero Jekyll Theme

Zero a minimal two-column Jekyll theme based on bootstrap 3.

## Features

- Tags & Categories
- SideBar
- Table of Contents
- Latex support (MathJax)
- Social icons
- Code block highlighting

##  Preview

See [Demo](https://lszero.github.io/).
